subsection.name: root
subsection.p: This specifies all of the elements which are combined to form a CVSROOT. They are split out into separate entities so that each can be individually overridden in a workspace definition. When an entity is listed a required below, it means that when all of the definitions are combined the entity must have a value - a workspace or profile, for example, only needs to contain the values which it overrides.
